title: Urgent: OTA update RQ2A.210405.005 bricked my Pixel 4a-5G
content:
The device is stuck in "Pixel is starting..."
I cannot send/receive calls but I can pull down the settings.
I tried calling Google and they want me to reset the device but it has my OTP codes on Google Authenticator. I will get locked out if I reset this phone.
This company should NOT be in the business of making phones.
